values: To sick to live to alive to die. Forget everything about this journal and it's "memories" and its so called "homies". In the end, you know whos true, and it wasnt even the end yet. Fuck peoples shit man. I aint innocent but it aint all my fault. I aint cut out for this drama shit so you all won, feel better now? Forget this world, forget this life. It's much easier that way. I've reached my breaking point. Thank you for killing me, again. This is the end of my journal, period. I now really truely know what it feels like to be alone.

Next week is finals. I aint wantin to take Rhodes finals. :-\

So who did I talk to this wonderful day? No one I usually do. I dont feel like speaking to Chris, Dani needs to mind her own buisness, and Chris needs to tell her to stay the fuck out of ours. Rich is a bit pissed cause I stood up for myself, of well, I aint gonna let no one talk shit. Mary and I are fine, whoo hoo. ITS THE WEEKEND, SCREW SCHOOL/DRAMA SHIT!! :-D MOVE ON!!!

I look so pertyful today and I keep going around the house singing lol...I sound pretty good :P I was going to take a picture for you!!! but the stupid ass people in my family like to use my stuff and burnt out the light for the camera...*growls* I dont touch their shit, why do they to it to mine. 

This weekends my Moms weekend. *grumbles* Its gonna fuckin suck. I dont get to see Matt or even talk to him over there. She blew that shit waay out of proporsion. Oh well...God'll get me through it. 

Well...I got a new journal....I know I always fucking change it but it's because stupid people <3 to bother me. Gah...*shrugs* hate me if you must.

*giggles really loud* Matts singin a song and its sooooo cute *lmao* Hes so adorable.

To much shit went down today...

People act as if all of a sudden I like changed or some shit and became a mutha fuckin shit talkin liar or summin man damn. I been the same way for years. I may talk shit, but its to the persons face, I've always been like that and if it's NOT to the persons face then if they ask me about it, I'll tell the truth. Even if I am in the wrong. 

Matt and me have been kinda fightin.
Rich and me have been kinda fightin cause his new girls a shit talker and I cant say nothin to her cause he said I'll loose his friendship.
Mary and me had a argument today over stupid he said she said bullshit which made me wonder why the fuck she acted that way so quickly.
Chris and me also had a talk about shit talkin and misunderstandments and shit, whos posed to be my boy n shit and, fuck it I dunno.

The whole world needs to smoke a blunt man and get the 5 mile pole out of their asses. Ya'll changed, not me. I got girlier lmao thats about it. 

Gods been about the only person I can stand to talk to.

Thats all for today.

My baby boy now has a LIVEJOURNAL :) Weee! You all know you <333 me so ADD HIM :D He wont update much because he doesnt have the internet but he will every chance he gets. I love you!!! and I love you too baby!!!!>?!>!>@RGRHT Oh yes...KrystalsPlaytoy is his username.

I read this and totally fell in love with it.

<small>"We must learn to call a truce with ourselves in our war against fat." 

How awesome is that sentence? I heard it this afternoon while flipping channels. I came across a show on Discovery Times called Understanding Obesity. I heard that sentence and stopped what I was doing. For me, it made perfect sense. 

We all know that society says that in order to be considered attractive, you should be thin. WRONG!! Everyone is different. There are plenty of thin women that wouldn't look right as larger sized women. There are also plenty of larger sized women that just wouldn't look right thin. 

Everyone's bodies are different. Some were meant to be larger than others. DIVERSITY IS THE SPICE OF LIFE!! It's what makes the world go 'round. I've maintained my weight of 260 for many years now. I feel like this is where I'm supposed to be. I still remain fairly active (I've always been more of a bookworm) and can do things without getting winded too easily. Maybe this is the weight that my body has decided is right for me. 

Maybe the woman that is 5'11" and weighs a SEXY 420lbs IS SUPPOSED TO BE THAT SIZE!! For whatever reason, genetics have determined that that is the best size for her. So long ofcourse as she feels healthy. THAT IS THE KEY!! 

YOU MUST FEEL HEALTHY IN YOUR OWN BODY!! When you feel as if you can't do things anymore because of your size, then lose weight. If you can't walk to the kitchen without getting winded, then lose weight!! BUT, that doesn't mean that you have to go down to a size 6!! Lose weight until you feel healthy again. No where does it state that in order to be HEALTHY, you have to be a twig. Healthy for me is going to be different than healthy for you. 

Ladies, you must also understand something. Being considered attractive doesn't always have anything to do with a persons size. For me, and a lot of my friends, it's about the attitude. If you carry yourself in a certain manner, you will get noticed! There is nothing sexier than a large woman who knows she's hot. Her confidence totally wins me over. 

Men and women alike have to realize when enough is enough. If diets aren't working for you, then maybe it's because your body is happy where it's at. You just have to get accustomed to that. That is the hardest part. Being able to say to yourself, as well as others, I'M HAPPY THE WAY I AM!! </small>

There are a lot of Big Beautiful Women out there and I think I can fit into that category. Dont you?

I've had a sorethroat/cough for a couple days now. 

I hope I aint getting fucking sick again.

I went shopping with my Mom yesturday got some new clothes. I am going to steal my baby's hoodie. I <3 it. I've come to the conclusion that I'm still going to wear PSY!!! WHOOOO! Hah. Just.....gurlier? I guess. Fuck if I know. Clothes are bullshit.  We should all just be naked. Or wear towels. Yeah

Last night was great. I spent the night with my beautiful baby. I love him <3 dearly. I had some fun too >;D Well I'ma go lay down cuz I dont feel so swift. MCL and I GOT A PINK OUTFIT!! :D

Answer these questions everyone/friends...as honest as possible.

1 IF I WAS GONE...WHAT WOULD YOU REMEMBER ME FOR? 
2 WHAT 5 WORDS WOULD YOU USE TO DESCRIBE ME?
3 WHAT WOULD YOUR LAST WORDS BE TO ME, IF WE COULD NEVER SEE EACHOTHER AGAIN?
4 WHERE DO YOU SEE IN 5-10 YEARS?
5 IF YOU WERE GOING TO GIVE ME ADVICE ABOUT LIVING WHAT WOULD YOU TELL ME?
6 WHAT QUOTE WOULD BEST DESCRIBE ME?
7 HAVE I EVER INSPIRED YOU? IF SO TO DO WHAT?

I feel like I'm going insane being by myself. From 5am to 5pm. No ones online.

___________________________________________________

Hopefully sooner or later I get updated pictures of myself. Everyone has been postin them and I cant cuz I look like shit and I'm sick. Weeo. 

I miss everyone :(
If only you knew what I feel right now..... it would bring tears to your eyes and it would make you want to die.

If you look at the earth, the earth is one plain surface. What's above life and below life is death and that's where we are. There's so many levels of death above and below where you're at in life. It is compliced, it goes on for eternity. There's millions of levels stacked with deathand we're waiting for you to join us......
You see, the dead are always watching you through the eyes of the vulture, through the eyes of the birds, because that way they can soar, they can watch what you're doing. Basically, they're just watching em' for entertainment purposes because it's funny that you fear death. You fear it and it wants you to taste it and you can't have it enough and they're just waiting for you to join them...

AWESOME poem my homie Nate wrote for me. It made me mad cry tears of happiness cuz it be SO TRUE!

No matter what, 
No matter where, 
My lil juggalette's 
always going to be here. 

together or apart it dont matter to me
because i'll always my juggalette
an hatchet family.


Sworn to the Dark Carnival, 
Forever following its ways, 
With my juggalette around 
It'll brighten the deepest darkest of my days. 

We don't die. 
We are together forever! 
Always there for each other. 
Us, leave the Carnival? NEVER. 

Family Forever. 
You just wait and see. 
i;ll laugh when your lonely, 
and wishin you was me,
Chilling with the hottest juggalette,
there possibly could be.
